Uses of Interface
org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseQueryable

Packages that use DatabaseQueryable
Package
Description
org.fluentjdbc
Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

  • Uses of DatabaseQueryable in org.fluentjdbc

    Classes in org.fluentjdbc with type parameters of type DatabaseQueryable
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    DatabaseQueryable<T extends DatabaseQueryable<T>>
    Interface to build WHERE-expressions for SELECT-statements.
    Subinterfaces of DatabaseQueryable in org.fluentjdbc
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    DatabaseQueryBuilder<T extends DatabaseQueryBuilder<T>>
    Interface for consistent query operations in a fluent way
    interface 
    DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder<T extends DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder<T>>
    Interface for consistent UPDATE and DELETE operations in a fluent way
    interface 
    DatabaseTable
    Provides a starting point for for fluent-jdbc with explicit Connection management
    interface 
    DbContextListableSelect<T extends DbContextListableSelect<T>>
    Interface to execute terminal operations for SELECT-statements.
    Classes in org.fluentjdbc that implement DatabaseQueryable
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DatabaseJoinedQueryBuilder
    DatabaseQueryBuilder used to generate joined queries using SQL-92 standard SELECT * FROM table1 a JOIN table2 b ON a.column = b.column.
    class 
    DatabaseSqlBuilder
    Used to construct SQL SELECT statements in a flexible way with where(String, Object) clauses, DatabaseSqlBuilder.select(String...) column names, DatabaseSqlBuilder.from(String) table statement, DatabaseSqlBuilder.groupBy(String...), DatabaseSqlBuilder.orderBy(String) and DatabaseSqlBuilder.skipAndLimit(int, int).
    class 
    DatabaseTableImpl
    Provides a starting point for for fluent-jdbc with explicit Connection management.
    class 
    DatabaseTableQueryBuilder
    Generate SELECT statements by collecting WHERE expressions and parameters.Example:
    class 
    DatabaseTableWithTimestamps
    DatabaseTable which automatically adds created_at and updated_at columns on DatabaseTableWithTimestamps.insert() and updated_at on DatabaseTableWithTimestamps.update()
    class 
    DatabaseWhereBuilder
    Used to build the WHERE ... clause of SQL statements such as SELECT, UPDATE and DELETE.
    class 
    DbContextJoinedSelectBuilder
    DbContextSelectBuilder used to generate joined queries using SQL-92 standard SELECT * FROM table1 a JOIN table2 b ON a.column = b.column.
    class 
    DbContextSelectBuilder
    Generate SELECT statements by collecting WHERE expressions and parameters.Example:
    class 
    DbContextSqlBuilder
    Used to construct SQL SELECT statements in a flexible way with where(String, Object) clauses, DbContextSqlBuilder.select(String...) column names, DbContextSqlBuilder.from(String) table statement, DbContextSqlBuilder.groupBy(String...), DbContextSqlBuilder.orderBy(String) and DbContextSqlBuilder.skipAndLimit(int, int).
    class 
    DbContextTable
    Provides a thread context oriented way of manipulating a table.
